MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool UseSystemColors { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to use rather than colors that match the current visual style.

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to use rather than colors that match the current visual style.

value.span: 若要使用，否則。

span.span: to use ; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果視覺化樣式或主題均已關閉，使用中的色彩。If visual styles or themes are turned off, the uses the colors in .
